text: The Council of the District of Columbia is authorized to make such rules and regulations as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of the District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1937, as amended and shall prescribe and publish all needful rules and regulations for the enforcement of the Revenue Act of 1939.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-3407.

1973 Ed., § 47-2502.

References in Text

The District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1937, referred to in this section, is 50 Stat. 673, approved August 17, 1937.

The Revenue Act of 1939, referred to in this section, is 50 Stat. 1087, approved July 26, 1939.

DC CODE § 47-3407

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
